benchmarks.name: ROS 2 Arm Control Loop Latency
benchmarks.description: Average latency for arm control command execution in ROS 2
benchmarks.environment: Ubuntu 22.04, ROS 2 Humble, Intel i7-10700K, 32GB RAM

benchmarks.name: Gazebo Physics Simulation FPS
benchmarks.description: Real-time factor maintained during humanoid physics simulation

benchmarks.name: Isaac Sim USD Scene Load Time
benchmarks.description: Time to load complex humanoid robot USD scene

benchmarks.name: VSLAM Tracking Accuracy
benchmarks.description: Visual SLAM position tracking accuracy in indoor environment
benchmarks.environment: Isaac ROS VSLAM, controlled indoor environment

benchmarks.name: Whisper Voice Recognition Accuracy
benchmarks.description: Speech-to-text accuracy for simple robot commands in quiet environment
benchmarks.environment: OpenAI Whisper small.en model, controlled audio conditions

benchmarks.name: LLM Cognitive Planning Response Time
benchmarks.description: Average time for LLM to generate action plan from natural language command
benchmarks.environment: OpenAI GPT-3.5-turbo API, simple navigation commands

benchmarks.name: Multi-Modal Fusion Pipeline Latency
benchmarks.description: End-to-end latency for multi-modal input processing and fusion
benchmarks.environment: ROS 2 Humble, combined vision, speech, and gesture inputs

benchmarks.name: Humanoid Navigation Success Rate
benchmarks.description: Success rate for humanoid robot navigation in dynamic environment
benchmarks.environment: Nav2 with humanoid-specific path planning, simulated environment
